content:
That's a great approach! Story mode is an excellent way to get introduced to the game's lore and mechanics, and it will help you build a solid foundation for your gameplay. By completing story mode, you'll get a better understanding of the characters, their motivations, and their playstyles.

When you jump into versus mode and online play, remember to stay focused, stay calm, and don't get discouraged by losses. It's all part of the learning process, and you'll improve with time and practice.

If you have any more questions or need further guidance, feel free to ask. I'll be here to help. Otherwise, have fun playing Guilty Gear Strive, and I hope you enjoy your journey into the world of Guilty Gear!

**Final tip:** Don't forget to check out the game's online resources, such as the official wiki, forums, and YouTube channels. These will provide you with a wealth of information on characters, strategies, and combos.

Good luck, and happy gaming!
